dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HJ 43 RH: Disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the Reproductive Health Non-Discrimination Amendment Act of 2014.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Black (for herself, Mr. Meadows, and Mr. Flores) introduced the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

Additional sponsors: Mr. Lamborn, Mr. Neugebauer, Mr. Jody B. Hice of Georgia, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Jones, Mr. Huelskamp, Mr. Walberg, Mr. Fleming, Mrs. Ellmers of North Carolina, Mr. Aderholt, Mr. Duncan of Tennessee, Mr. Pitts, Mr. Olson, Mr. Lipinski, Mr. Smith of Texas, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mr. Rothfus, Mrs. Wagner, Mr. Mullin, Mr. King of Iowa, Mr. Massie, Mr. Roskam, Mr. Rouzer, Mr. Yoho, Mr. Westerman, Mr. Babin, Mr. Mulvaney, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, Mrs. Roby, Mr. Messer, Mr. Amash, Mr. Smith of Nebraska, Mr. Sam Johnson of Texas, Mr. Pompeo, Mr. Byrne, Mr. Harris, Mrs. Noem, Mrs. Hartzler, Mrs. Walorski, Mr. Stutzman, Mr. Allen, Mr. Franks of Arizona, Mr. Hill, Mr. Fleischmann, Mr. Brady of Texas, and Mr. Marchant
Referred to the House Calendar and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: Disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the Reproductive Health Non-Discrimination Amendment Act of 2014.

section.text: That the Congress disapproves of the action of the District of Columbia Council described as follows: The Reproductive Health Non-Discrimination Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20–593), signed by the Mayor of the District of Columbia on January 25, 2015, and transmitted to Congress pursuant to section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act on March 6, 2015.

endorsement.action-desc: Referred to the House Calendar and ordered to be printed
